trans-unit.source: Represents a linear collection of elements in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en lineær samling elementene i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewBand class represents <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> elements joined together in a band that can be manipulated as a group.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewBand klassen representerer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>slått sammen i et verdiområde kan endres fordi en gruppe elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Each element is typically an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> or one of its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Hvert element er vanligvis en forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>eller én av de avledede klassene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Although a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> is associated with each band, header cells are not considered elements of the band.
trans-unit.target: Selv om en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>er knyttet til hver bånd hodet celler regnes ikke med elementer for feltet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: DataGridViewBand is the base class of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> classes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewBand er basisklasse for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>klasser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: There are no public constructors for the DataGridViewBand type, so the only way to access a band is through columns and rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes ingen offentlig konstruktør for typen DataGridViewBand slik at den eneste måten å få tilgang til et felt er kolonnene og radene i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this band.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne verdiområde.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a row or column of cells.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til dupliserte rader og kolonner med celler.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer det klonede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the band.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hurtigmenyen for feltet.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu appears when a user clicks the right mouse button in the band's display area.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigmenyen vises når brukeren klikker Høyreklikk i området for det båndet visning.

trans-unit.source: The display area is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Visningsområdet er et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> tilknyttet gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style of the band.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardstilen for celle for feltet.

trans-unit.source: The default cell style is applied to cells that do not have an associated style.
trans-unit.target: Den standard celle stilen celler som ikke har en tilknyttet stil.

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the default cell style does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Under henting av denne egenskapen en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med standard verdier opprettes hvis cellen standardstilen ikke finnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the run-time type of the default header cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kjøretid typen standard hodet cellen.

trans-unit.source: This property must get or set an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> class or one of its derived types.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må hente eller angi en forekomst av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>klasse eller en av de avledede typene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> as the default header cell type.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>klasse bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>som standard hodet celletype.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>klassen bruker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: If you are using a custom type derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> in a row or column, the DefaultHeaderCellType property must be set to the custom type.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker en egendefinert type utledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>i rader og kolonner, må egenskapen DefaultHeaderCellType settes til den egendefinerte typen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that describes the run-time class of the object used as the default header cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som beskriver klassen kjøretid på objektet som brukes som standard hodet cellen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a <xref:System.Type> representing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> or a derived type.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er en <xref:System.Type>som representerer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> eller en avledet type.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the band is currently displayed onscreen.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om feltet for øyeblikket vises på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band is currently onscreen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feltet er for øyeblikket på skjermen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>ble bruker.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources associated with the band.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressursene som er knyttet til feltet.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjons-koden kan ikke kalle denne metoden. et objekts `Finalize` metode startes automatisk under datasanering, med mindre finalization av saneringsoppsamlingen er deaktivert av et kall til den <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [fullføre metoder og destruktører](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og [overstyrer metoden fullføre](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: When called by the garbage collector, this method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ved kall av saneringsoppsamlingen, denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Dispose%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band will move when a user scrolls through the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om feltet flyttes når brukeren ruller via den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property can hold a band of important information in place when a user scrolls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan inneholde et verdiområde av viktig informasjon i stedet når brukeren ruller via <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Bands adjacent to the frozen band will move over the frozen band.
trans-unit.target: Verdiområder tilstøtende til låste bånd flyttes over låste verdiområde.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band cannot be scrolled from view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feltet ikke kan rulles fra visningen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*> property has been set.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>egenskapen er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property automatically instantiates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> if the property has not previously been accessed.
trans-unit.target: Henting av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen automatisk starter en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>Hvis egenskapen tidligere ikke er åpnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must, therefore, use the HasDefaultCellStyle property to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property is currently set to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> instance.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor bruke egenskapen HasDefaultCellStyle å finne ut om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen er satt til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>forekomsten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful to determine which properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.InheritedStyle%2A> property represent styles set specifically for the band.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for å finne ut hvilke egenskaper på objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen representerer stiler angitt spesielt for feltet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.InheritedStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om celle stil arv [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*> property has been set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>egenskapen er angitt; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header cell of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir celle topptekst i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> representing the header cell of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> som representerer celle topptekst i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref> instance is of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref> og dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref> forekomsten er av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value when setting this property is not a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref> instance is of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er ikke en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref> og dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref> forekomsten er av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the relative position of the band within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den relative posisjonen for feltet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the band within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen tilsvarer ikke nødvendigvis gjeldende visual posisjon for feltet i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user reorders columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> at run time (assuming the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns%2A> property is set to `true`), the value of the Index property of each column will not change.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren endrer rekkefølge kolonner i for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>på kjøretidspunktet (forutsatt at det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns%2A>er satt til `true`), verdi for egenskapen indeksen for hver kolonne som ikke endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> values change.
trans-unit.target: I stedet kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sorting rows, however, does change their Index values.
trans-unit.target: Sorterer rader, imidlertid endrer tilhørende verdier.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the band in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"></xref> that it is contained within.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte posisjonen for felt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> som finnes i.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, indicating that there is no associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som angir at det er ikke tilknyttet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style in effect for the current band, taking into account style inheritance.
trans-unit.target: Henter cellestilen aktivert for den gjeldende skal være, tar i kontoen stil arv.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> class always returns `null` because this base class cannot contain elements.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringen av denne egenskapen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>klasse alltid returnerer `null` fordi denne basisklassen ikke kan inneholde elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: For more information about style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om stilen arv [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the band represents a row.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om feltet representerer en rad.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feltet representerer en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the band is associated with a different <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når feltet er knyttet til en annen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the band's cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan redigere den utenforliggende celler.

trans-unit.source: The ReadOnly property affects the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each cell in the band.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly-egenskapen påvirkes av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for hver celle i skal være.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ReadOnly property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> changes, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of all cells in the row will change.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis ReadOnly-egenskapen for et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>endringene, og deretter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for alle celler i raden endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user cannot edit the band's cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren ikke kan redigere den utenforliggende celler. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref> instance is a shared <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref> forekomsten er en delt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band can be resized in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om feltet kan endres i brukergrensesnittet (UI).

trans-unit.source: You can prevent users from resizing individual rows or columns by setting their Resizable properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hindre brukere endrer størrelse på individuelle rader eller kolonner ved å angi egenskapene for dem størrelsen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the Resizable property value is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeColumns%2A> property value for columns and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A> property value for rows.
trans-unit.target: Som standard kan endre størrelse på egenskapsverdien er basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeColumns%2A>egenskapsverdien for kolonner og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A>egenskapsverdien for rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, however, the control value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter eksplisitt endre størrelsen til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, men kontrollverdien ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> to restore the inheritance.
trans-unit.target: Endre størrelsen WantDestinationQueue <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>til å gjenopprette arvingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> restores the value inheritance, the Resizable property will never return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> value unless the row or column has not been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Fordi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>gjenoppretter verdi-arv egenskapen kan endre størrelse på aldri vil returnere en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>verdi hvis raden eller kolonnen ikke er lagt til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: If you need to determine whether the Resizable property value of a row or column is inherited, check its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger å finne ut om størrelsen egenskapsverdien for rader og kolonner er arvet, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> flag, the Resizable property value is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>verdien inneholder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>flagg kan endre størrelse på egenskapsverdien er ikke arvet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Resizable property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, the user will not be able to manually adjust band size.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kan endre størrelse på egenskapsverdi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, brukeren ikke justere manuelt utenforliggende størrelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band is in a selected user interface (UI) state.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om feltet har statusen valgte brukergrensesnittet (UI).

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property enabled is associated with the band.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan angis bare hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapen aktivert er knyttet til feltet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feltet er merket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, but the band has not been added to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, men feltet er ikke lagt til en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: -or- This property is being set on a shared <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - egenskapen er angitt på en delt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data to associate with the band.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir objektet som inneholder data som skal knyttes til feltet.

trans-unit.source: The Tag property can store any object that you want to associate with a band.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Tag kan lagre alle objekter som du vil knytte til et felt.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used to store identifying information, such as a string name, a unique identifier (for example, a <xref:System.Guid>), or the index of the band's data in a database.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å lagre identifiserende informasjon, for eksempel et navn på tilkoblingsstrengen, en unik ID (for eksempel en <xref:System.Guid>), eller det båndet data i en database.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains information associated with the band.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder informasjon som er knyttet til feltet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current band.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer gjeldende verdiområde.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer den <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The returned string contains the class's name and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte strengen inneholder den Klassenavn og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band is visible to the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om feltet er synlig for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to hide extraneous columns or rows.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes til å skjule overflødige kolonner eller rader.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feltet er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and the band is the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> og feltet raden for nye poster.
